about_the_game:
Can't get enough Umamusume?

Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash Team Bundle

gives you access to all three DLC packs,

"DLC Vol. 1: Team Iris"

"DLC Vol. 2: Team Geranium"

"DLC Vol. 3: Team Primrose"

as well as special titles!

*The "Umamusume: Pretty Derby" Item Set (Redeemable Code) is not included.

*Content details and specifications are subject to change without prior notice.

*Actual items may differ from the image shown.

*The Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash Deluxe Box comes with a download code for Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash Team Bundle. Be careful not to buy the same DLC twice.

*The Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash Special Edition (Steam®) comes with Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash Team Bundle. Be careful not to buy the same DLC twice.

*The content of the DLC packs will become available in-game after their respective release dates.

*The DLC packs included in this bundle can also be purchased individually. Be careful not to buy them twice.

*The titles are only obtainable through Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash Team Bundle.

*Requires the base game to use. Make sure your game is updated to the latest version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / i7
  • Memory: ４ MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1650 / Radeon RX6400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 16:9 resolution monitor for optimal performance.

short_description: Add more playable characters to your roster!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
